effect_entries.effect: Teaches Ice Beam to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Ice Beam to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Snore)

flavor_text_entries.text:
凍える　ビームを
相手に　発射して　攻撃する。
こおり状態に　することが　ある。

The target is struck with an icy-
cold beam of energy. This may
also leave the target frozen.

Il nemico è colpito da un raggio di energia gelida
che può anche congelarlo.

Lanza una bola oscura que puede bajar la
Defensa Especial del objetivo.

Das Ziel wird von einem eiskalten Energiestrahl
getroffen. Dieser friert es eventuell ein.

Un rayon de glace frappe l’ennemi.
Peut aussi le geler.

냉동빔을
상대에게 발사하여 공격한다.
얼음 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

れいきの　ビームを　はっしゃして
こうげきする。　あいてを　こおりの
じょうたいに　することが　ある。

The target is struck with an icy-cold
beam of energy.
It may also freeze the target solid.

The target is struck with an icy-cold
beam of energy.
It may also freeze the target solid.

Un rayon de glace frappe l’ennemi.
Peut aussi le geler.

The foe is struck with an icy-cold
beam of energy. It may also freeze
the target solid.

The foe is struck with an icy-cold
beam of energy. It may also freeze
the target solid.

The foe is struck with an icy-cold
beam of energy. It may also freeze
the target solid.

The foe is struck
with an icy beam.
It may freeze the
foe solid.

Fires an icy cold
beam that may
freeze the foe.

Fires an icy cold
beam that may
freeze the foe.
